notice.ch: 上課教室為健雄館S4-208I (數學與理論中心入口左側教室)

remark.ch: 上課教室為健雄館S4-208I (數學與理論中心入口左側教室)

goal.ch: 本課程旨在為學生提供關鍵知識、數學和計算工具的實踐培訓以及現代生物物理學研究的視角，以便學生能夠定量描述和理解生物現象。
goal.en: This course is designed to give students critical knowledge, hands-on training in mathematical and computational tools, as well as perspective on modern biophysics research such that the students can quantitatively describe and understand biological phenomena.

outline.ch:
(1) 生物影像數據處理與分析
(2) 人工智慧深度學習模型簡介(以CNN模型為例)
(3) 經典生物模型簡介(以生物圖樣生成為例)
(4) 科學文獻導讀
outline.en:
(1) Bio-image data processing and analysis
(2) Introduction to deep learning models (taking CNN model as an example)
(3) Introduction to classic bio-models (taking biological pattern formation as an example)
(4) Scientific literature review and report

textbook.ch:
(1) R. Phillips et al., Physical Biology of the Cell (ISBN: 978-0815344506)
(2) Philip Nelson, Biological Physics (ISBN: 978-0716743729)
textbook.en:
(1) R. Phillips et al., Physical Biology of the Cell (ISBN: 978-0815344506)
(2) Philip Nelson, Biological Physics (ISBN: 978-0716743729)

gradMethod.ch:
(1) 期中專題報告 (30％)
(2) 文獻閱讀口頭報告 x 2 (each 25％, total 50％)
(3) 出席狀況 (15％)
(4) 學習態度與課堂表現 (5％)
gradMethod.en:
(1) Mid-term project report (30％)
(2) (Literature oral presentation) x 2 (each 25％, total 50％)
(3) Attendance status (15％)
(4) Learning attitude and Class performance (5％)

officeHour.ch: 週一上午10點至12點；週二上午10點至12點

flexDiscription.ch: 課程和授課內容將根據實際進度以影片或報告的形式進行調整。
flexDiscription.en: The course content and lecturing would be adjusted in the form of videos or reports according to the actual progress.

domain.ch: 複雜系統，軟物質與生物物理
domain.en: 複雜系統，軟物質與生物物理

en.competencies: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield
